markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Chance Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=2354) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 29 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You would die as a result of a failed saving throw or recovery check.

</column>

---

Your previous life ended due to sheer poor luck, struck by lightning or choking on a fish bone. You can reroll the triggering recovery check or saving throw, but you must use the new result, even if it's worse than the first roll.

**Special** You can select this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.
name: Chance Death
